levels.description: Attacks an ally within range (prioritizes allies directly in front of this unit) <@ba.vup>15</> times for <@ba.vup>{damage}</> damage, and then increases the Max HP and DEF of self and that unit by <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</> for the remaining duration of this skill

Attacks an ally within range (prioritizes allies directly in front of this unit) <@ba.vup>15</> times for <@ba.vup>{damage}</> damage, and then increases the Max HP and DEF of self and that unit by <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</> for the remaining duration of this skill
